languages.text: Applies Immolation status that acts like {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} 8, but cannot be removed till the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, target must perform {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (+5) {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Applies Immolation status that acts like Burning 8, but cannot be removed till the end of combat. When hit, target must perform Toughness (+5) test or be Stunned for 1 round.
